text: Patna Law College is a college imparting education in law in Bihar. It was established in the year 1909 and offers bachelor's degree in laws (LL.B.degree). The college is affiliated to Patna University. ==References== == External links == * Patna Law College Category:Colleges affiliated to Patna University Category:Law schools in Bihar Category:Universities and colleges in Patna Category:1909 establishments in India Category:Educational institutions established in 1909
title: Patna Law College
